product_name: Sierra Designs Hurricane Rain Pants - Kids' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: They might not notice them at the bottom of their pack, but when that distant thunder becomes a downpour, your child will be happy to have the Sierra Designs Hurricane Rain Pants within easy reach. Ripstop nylon fabric features a waterproof, breathable laminate for complete protection from wind and rain; seams are taped to seal out water. Elastic waist and articulated knees offer enhanced fit and freedom of movement. 10-in. ankle zippers with storm flaps allow easy on/off. Closeout.
short_description: They might not notice them at the bottom of their pack, but when that distant thunder becomes a downpour, your child will be happy to have the Sierra Designs Hurricane Rain Pants within easy reach.
